topics.body:
Okay, there's one scene in Daredevil that has a bit too much narrative coincidence for my taste.
[spoiler]You're telling me that Karen and Ben, while investigating Wilson Fisk, just so happened to take a drive all the way to UPSTATE NEW YORK where Wilson Fisk's mother was staying? And then by some miracle happened to randomly knock on her door out of the literally DOZENS of others?[/spoiler]
